MeasurementToolMetadata.Description: ADRC Uniform Data Set v2 - A5: Subject Health History

age.Description: Age of the participant at visit

CVOTHRX.Description: Other cardiovascular disease (specify) (Blank if CVOTHR in {0, 9})

CBSTROKE.Description: Stroke - by history, not exam (imaging is not required)

STROK1YR.Description: If recent/active or remote/inactive, indicate year in which stroke occurred. (Blank if CBSTROKE in {0, 9})

STROK2YR.Description: If recent/active or remote/inactive, indicate year in which stroke occurred. (Blank if CBSTROKE in {0, 9})

STROK3YR.Description: If recent/active or remote/inactive, indicate year in which stroke occurred. (Blank if CBSTROKE in {0, 9})

STROK4YR.Description: If recent/active or remote/inactive, indicate year in which stroke occurred. (Blank if CBSTROKE in {0, 9})

STROK5YR.Description: If recent/active or remote/inactive, indicate year in which stroke occurred. (Blank if CBSTROKE in {0, 9})

STROK6YR.Description: If recent/active or remote/inactive, indicate year in which stroke occurred. (Blank if CBSTROKE in {0, 9})

TIA1YR.Description: If recent/active or remote/inactive, indicate year in which transient ischemic attack occurred. (Blank if CBTIA in {0, 9})

TIA2YR.Description: If recent/active or remote/inactive, indicate year in which transient ischemic attack occurred. (Blank if CBTIA in {0, 9})

TIA3YR.Description: If recent/active or remote/inactive, indicate year in which transient ischemic attack occurred. (Blank if CBTIA in {0, 9})

TIA4YR.Description: If recent/active or remote/inactive, indicate year in which transient ischemic attack occurred. (Blank if CBTIA in {0, 9})

TIA5YR.Description: If recent/active or remote/inactive, indicate year in which transient ischemic attack occurred. (Blank if CBTIA in {0, 9})

TIA6YR.Description: If recent/active or remote/inactive, indicate year in which transient ischemic attack occurred. (Blank if CBTIA in {0, 9})

PDYR.Description: Year of PD diagnosis (Blank if PD in {0, 9})

PDOTHRYR.Description: Year of parkinsonian disorder diagnosis (Blank if PDOTHR in {0, 9})

TRAUMBRF.Description: TBI with brief loss of consciousness (< 5 minutes)

TRAUMEXT.Description: TBI with extended loss of consciousness (5 minutes or longer)

TRAUMCHR.Description: TBI with chronic deficit or dysfunction

DEP2YRS.Description: Active depression in the last two years

DEPOTHR.Description: Depression episodes more than two years ago

ALCOHOL.Description: Alcohol abuse: Clinically significant impairment occuring over a 12-month period manifested in one of the following areas: work, driving, legal, or social

TOBAC30.Description: Has the subject smoked within the last 30 days?

TOBAC100.Description: Has the subject smoked more than 100 cigarettes in his/her life?

PACKSPER.Description: Average number of packs smoked per day

QUITSMOK.Description: If the subject quit smoking, specify age at which he/she last smoked (i.e., quit)

ABUSOTHR.Description: Other abused substances: Clinically significant impairment occuring over a 12-month period manifested in one of the following areas: work, driving, legal, or social

PSYCDISX.Description: If recent/active or remote/inactive, specify disorder
